<h2>*Version Class:*</h2>

<img src="http://imageshack.us/a/img16/5397/multipleg.jpg" width="26" height="24"/> <img src="http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/1315/sequencej.jpg" width="26" height="24"/>

     ==Major==

     <img src="http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/2777/elementkw.jpg"  width="26" height="24"/>

     The major version number ('1' in 1.2) as defined by the content creators.

     <b>Class:</b> xs:nonNegativeInteger.


     ==Minor==

     <img src="http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4808/optional.jpg"  width="26" height="24"/>


     An optional minor version number ('2' in 1.2)

     <b>Class:</b> xs:nonNegativeInteger.


     ==Modifier==

     <img src="http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4808/optional.jpg"  width="26" height="24"/>

     Unconstrained text specifying status + optional number, e. g., 'beta', 'alpha', 'rc/release candidate', 'internal'. If missing, release status is assumed.


     ==Major==

     <img src="http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4808/optional.jpg"  width="26" height="24"/>

     <b>Quick Reference:</b>

     An optional minor version number ('2' in 1.2).

    <b>Class:</b> xs:nonNegativeInteger.


     ==Date Issued==

     <img src="http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4808/optional.jpg"  width="26" height="24"/>

     Source for Dublin-Core standard element Date.Issued: Citable 'publication date' of the current version (comp. Revision_Data/Date_Created and Date_Modified for version- independent dates). This date should be missing if the current version is not yet published!.

     <b>Class:</b> xs:date.


     ==Preferred Flag==

     <img src="http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4808/optional.jpg"  width="26" height="24"/>

     <b>Quick Reference:</b>

     TRUE to indicate currente version when providers serve more than one record per taxon.
